channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dumbing it down

item.title: In Trump’s Space Race, Musk’s SpaceX Is A Sure Bet
item.description: Trump victory is a boon for space policy — And Musk's SpaceX.

item.title: First Leucistic Angular Roughshark Found In Albania’s Waters
item.description: The ghostly white shark provides insight into rare pigment disorders in deep-sea species.

item.title: “What should I do now?”

item.title: Privilege Escalation Threats: Fortifying Security With An Access Management Strategy
item.description: As cyber techniques evolve and threat actors exploit vulnerabilities, privilege escalation has emerged as a critical and pervasive threat.

item.title: How CISOs Can Break Through Board-Level Budget Conversations
item.description: It’ll take more than a polite request for CISOs to justify increased solutions and spend in their 2025 fiscal year IT budgets.
